It is not recommended to disable the notification since you might inadvertently keep tracking turned on.
Protect motorists from themselves by corking!
Do not drive on the opposite lane.
When driving in the front: No speeding! When driving in the rear: Close gaps!
If you really have to though, try to warn people behind you.
When driving at the head: Stop at the redlights!
When you arrive at a red light while driving as part of the head of the mass, be sure to stop when the traffic light shows red.
Don\'t allow yourself to be provoked. Be friendly to the police, motorists and everybody else, even if they are not.
Enjoy reclaimed streets. Go checkout the Sound Bikes. Chat with motorists, pedestrian and let them know what\'s going on. Most importantly: Have fun!
